video.title: Witnesses
video.synopsis: A young female detective is put in charge of a case and must delve into her partner's mysterious past in order to solve it.

episodes.synopsis: Detective Sandra Winckler follows a bizarre clue to begin unraveling a ghastly crime perpetrated in a model home.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Winckler gets a new partner, veteran detective Paul Maisonneuve, but she soon suspects that someone from his past is out to settle an old score.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: In the model home, Detectives Winckler and Maisonneuve uncover evidence that Kaz Gorbier is still alive, but is he the man they're looking for?
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Kaz Gorbier takes hostages and flees, Detective Maisonneuve sets out after him -- but Gorbier has a few dirty tricks up his sleeve.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: With the clock ticking, Detective Winckler sets out to save her partner, Detective Maisonneuve, from the clutches of Kaz Gorbier.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Detective Maisonneuve discovers the culprit responsible for the harassment he has suffered and its grim connection to the unearthed bodies.
episodes.title: Episode 6
